messages.zh: 第三关（后）
messages.tl: Third pass (after)

messages.zh: 成功歼灭敌方小队。
messages.tl: Successfully annihilated the enemy squad.

messages.zh: 只有保证对方消息的阻塞，才能保障我们的安全。
messages.tl: Only by ensuring the blocking of the other party's messages can we guarantee our security.
......I know.

messages.zh: 伤口有开裂吗？
messages.tl: Is the wound cracked?

messages.zh: 没问题了，谢谢你。
messages.tl: No problem, thank you.

messages.zh: 没什么没什么。嗯？那边的伤员——喂，等等！
messages.tl: Nothing is nothing. Ok? The wounded there - hell, wait!

messages.zh: 真是个天使。
messages.tl: It’s an angel.

messages.zh: 每次看到她努力的样子，就觉得......
messages.tl: Every time I see her trying hard, I feel...

messages.zh: 嗯......就会感觉，我们还没到驻足休憩的时候。
messages.tl: Um... I will feel that we have not yet stopped to rest.

messages.zh: 是的。我们不仅仅是在为了自己战斗。
messages.tl: Yes. We are not just fighting for ourselves.

messages.zh: 刚才你们说得对。像我们罗德岛这样的是极少数。
messages.tl: You are right now. There are very few like our Rhode Island.

messages.zh: 世上大多数人都厌恶我们感染者。
messages.tl: Most people in the world hate our Infected Person.

messages.zh: 所以我们也同样应该敌视普通人——我原本也有那样的偏见。
messages.tl: So we should also be hostile to Citizen - I originally had such prejudice.

messages.zh: 来到罗德岛才发现也有她这样的孩子。
messages.tl: When I came to Rhode Island, I found out that there were also children like her.

messages.zh: 明明是普通人......却不顾感染的威胁，和我们一起出生入死，为我们奔走......
messages.tl: It is Citizen... but regardless of the threat of infection, we are born and died with us, running for us...

messages.zh: 罗德岛的每一位都是好人。
messages.tl: Everyone in Rhode Island is a good person.

messages.zh: 也许很多人因畏惧与敌意，相互间产生了种种隔阂......
messages.tl: Perhaps many people have created various barriers between each other because of fear and hostility...

messages.zh: 但只要在罗德岛，大家一定能解开误会。
messages.tl: But as long as you are in Rhode Island, you will be able to solve the misunderstanding.

messages.zh: ......你说得对，阿米娅。
messages.tl: ... you are right, Amiya.

messages.zh: 小心，我来扶你......
messages.tl: Be careful, I will help you...
No need to......

messages.zh: 啊，{@nickname}博士——
messages.tl: Ah, Dr. PLAYER -

messages.zh: ——谢谢。
messages.tl: --Thank you.

messages.zh: 多亏了你，我们才能杀出来。
messages.tl: Thanks to you, we can kill it.

messages.zh: 我相信你和阿米娅......相信罗德岛的诸位。
messages.tl: I believe in you and Amiya... I believe in Rhode Island.

messages.zh: 我也相信你们。我们一定能突破困局的。
messages.tl: I also believe in you. We will certainly be able to break through the dilemma.
